To center the div horizontally, you can modify the className as follows:
```tsx <div className='flex items-center justify-between w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto'> ```
This change adds:
1. `max-w-7xl`: Sets a maximum width for the div (you can adjust this value based on your needs). 2. `mx-auto`: Applies automatic horizontal margins, which centers the div within its parent container.
These additions will maintain the existing flex layout and full width, while ensuring the div is centered horizontally within the page. The `max-w-7xl` class prevents the content from stretching too wide on larger screens, improving readability and layout consistency.
